p: For the COP22 sample, attendees of the COP22 in Marrakesh, 2016 were asked whether they wanted to fill in a questionnaire on the communication of climate science that would take approximately 10 min. Attendees were approached both in the “green zone” that is accessible to the interested public, and the “blue zone” that requires UN accreditation. A total of n = 58 attendees volunteered to participate, without any incentives offered. The sample consists of three groups: (1) Politics, government, and diplomacy; (2) Academia; and (3) other (e.g., NGO, private sector), with participants coming from a total of twenty-three countries. The student sample consisted of a total of n = 82 Heidelberg University recruited in a mathematics lecture. See Table 1 for a complete description of the sample composition.
